dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6773 IH: Senator Dianne Feinstein Memorial Trail Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Thompson of California (for himself and Mr. Huffman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the Senator Dianne Feinstein Memorial Trail in Headwaters Forest Reserve, California.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Senator Dianne Feinstein Memorial Trail Act.

subsection.text: The Elk River Trail in Headwaters Forest Reserve, California, shall hereafter be known and designated as the Senator Dianne Feinstein Memorial Trail.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Elk River Trail in Headwaters Forest Reserve shall be deemed to be a reference to the Senator Dianne Feinstein Memorial Trail.
